content.description:
P-1 5.10c 100' Follow the slab to the left past 2 bolts then straight up on continuous face climbing to a rap anchor. Better to climb past this anchor another anchor 10' above (no rap rings).

P-2 5.11b 95' The wall gets steep here with the crux after several bolts. Higher, move left under a roof and cross it with a hand crack above (hard move). The anchor is a short distance above the roof.

P-3 5.8 85' Climb past a series of small ledges with some small cams and bolts. Rap the route. Use the lower 1st pitch anchor with rings to rap.
content.protection: P1&2 12 Bolts per pitch, P3 mixed, pro 1"

content.description: Sustained face climbing to the crux traverse about halfway. Improbable moves to the left on sidepulls.
content.location: Scramble up past the large block to the route.

content.description: Begin in a arching crack (gear here) and clip a bolt. Move left around a small roof to another bolt. Now step right over the roof (1st crux) then straight up past several bolts. Move left around a corner onto a ramp below some shallow cracks. Use these (2nd crux) past several more bolts to the anchor. Sustained route.
content.protection: small cam or wire at the start. 10 bolts
content.location: Next route to the left of Shadow Dragon.

content.description:
P-1 5.10b 95' Starts in a crack with the first bolt off a small grassy ledge. Jam past another bolt then gear to a right traverse, 8'. Continue up past bolts and gear to a semi-hanging belay. About 15' above this belay is a nice ledge with an anchor. Do not rap from this anchor, 60M rope will not reach the ground.

P-2 5.10a 80'   Follow the bolts to another anchor. Most rap from here.

P-3 5.8 R  Haven't done this pitch so not to much beta. It does have a rap anchor at about 80'. Appears to take gear to 2" and a runout on face at the end.
Start on a ledge and get tough.

P-1 5.9 99'  Follow bolts up a diagonal corner then cut back at a crack. At its end move right past a bolt to the anchor.

P-2 5.10a 95' Continue in a crack with gear and bolts, then onto face and ending with a crack.
content.location: High up the Shadow Wall ramp, starts near Raising the Barra.

content.description: Climb up the chimney and stem across to the first bolt. Several bolts up a steep face to a crux moving right. Then nice edges and ledges to the anchor.
content.location: Just uphill from Shadow Dragon, starts where the large block forms a chimney.

content.description: Scratch your way up a small right facing corner.
content.location: Next route uphill from Enter the Dragon

content.description:
P-1 5.10d 75' Begin with a strenuous hand crack into a corner. Continue up this with some hard stems and back steps to a ledge.

P-2 5.10a 75'  Continue with the crack and ledges with some bolts and gear to the anchor. For a good workout combine the 2 pitches but you'll need more cams. Most rap from here.

P-35.11a 75' Climb into a slot past several bolts. Rap the route.
content.protection: single rack thru 3", wires, several bolts
content.location: Obvious crack/dihedral system uphill from Reunited.
